name: Pic-o-nic Baskets: A Yogi Bear Sim
name_original: Pic-o-nic Baskets: A Yogi Bear Sim
description:
This is the first game I have ever made.

In this game, you are Yogi Bear. you have to collect "pic-o-nic" baskets to increase your score, and get the highest score possible before Ranger Smith catches you.

I do not own Yogi Bear, or any properties, characters, etc. of the show. This is merely a fan game that I made for fun.
